title: Clicker-Based Problem-Solving Mathematics Learning Program for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience in solving job-related problems
context.additional_context: Environment emphasizing real-time interaction and project-based assessment using digital devices (smartpads/laptops), with most learners being job seekers or aiming to strengthen workplace competencies

learning_goals: Learners solve math problems based on real-world job scenarios with over 80% accuracy using clickers.
Learners provide peer learners with problem-solving strategies at least three times during discussions by analyzing clicker feedback.
Learners create a digital portfolio documenting the systematic process of solving complex math problems through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
